text: The Islamic Resistance in Iraq is an umbrella term for pro-Iran insurgent groups in Iraq. These groups all have a similar ideology and are backed by Iran to fight against the Western world and particularly the United States. ==Groups== These are the groups which are often or sometimes called the "Islamic Resistance in Iraq": *Kata'ib Hezbollah *Popular Mobilization Forces *Harakat Hezbollah al-Nujaba *Asa'ib Ahl al-Haq *Kata'ib Sayyid al-Shuhada *Badr Organization *Ashab al-Kahf *Kata'ib al-Imam Ali *Saraya Awliya al-Dam *Al-Fadl al-Abbas Brigades *Katibat al-Sabiqun *Liwa al-Khaybar *Zulfiqar Forces *Avenger Brigades *League of the Revolutionaries *Revenge of Muhandis Brigade *Tashkil al-Waritheen *Al-Zafirin Group == Related pages == * Houthi movement ==References== Category:2020s in Iran
title: Islamic Resistance in Iraq
